fact_text: A total of 17 helicopters are assigned to the fire today.

The Carr fire in California has claimed two lives, including a pair of firefighters. The blaze has burned over 800 square miles of the state and is still raging. Meanwhile, in Iowa, a tornado has killed one person and injured several others.
